channel.title: Rotate your app’s client secrets :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Rotate your app’s client secrets Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: - No specific user research obtained for client secrets Client secrets are used in Authentication hence the reason why they are in Authenticate Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Client secret rotation and key management: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/client-secret-rotation-key/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
